abstract: With multiple presidential hopefuls indicating that they will not spend money on the gathering this summer, a group of Republican activists in Iowa has become concerned about the importance of the tradition seeming to diminish.

headline.main: Iowa Republicans Move to Draw Candidates to Straw Poll

snippet: With multiple presidential hopefuls indicating that they will not spend money on the gathering this summer, a group of Republican activists in Iowa has become concerned about the importance of the tradition seeming to diminish.
